facts.fact: Bananas are berries, but strawberries aren't.
A day on Venus is longer than a year on Venus.
Napoleon was once attacked by a horde of bunnies.
Octopuses have three hearts and blue blood.
The first email was sent in 1971 by Ray Tomlinson.
Canada has more lakes than the rest of the world combined.
The human brain generates enough electricity to power a light bulb.
Honey never spoils and can last for thousands of years.
The Olympic Games were originally a religious festival in ancient Greece.
The Mona Lisa has no visible eyelashes or eyebrows.
